message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor that can cause a dry cough as a side effect. None of the other listed medications are known to cause a dry cough as a side effect.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor that can cause a dry cough as a side effect. The other medications listed are not known to cause this symptom. The patient's recent history of MI may have prompted his physician to prescribe ramipril to manage his blood pressure or heart function.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor that can cause a dry cough in about 5% to 20% of patients. Clopidogrel, nitroglycerin, and lovastatin are not associated with dry cough as a side effect.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor that may cause a dry cough as a side effect. Clopidogrel, nitroglycerin, and lovastatin are not known to cause cough as a side effect. The patient's recent MI and medication history make it more likely that the cough is related to medication side effects rather than a respiratory illness.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the options, ramipril has the known side effect of causing a dry cough. The other medications listed do not typically cause this symptom. A recent MI and the medications suggest a potential cause for the cough could be heart failure, but a chest exam was normal which makes this less likely.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor that can cause a dry cough as a side effect, while the other options are less likely to cause coughing. Given that the patient is on several medications, it is important to consider side effects of each medication when evaluating a symptom.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. A dry cough is a common side effect of ACE inhibitors such as ramipril. None of the other medications listed have a dry cough as a common side effect.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the options, ramipril is an ACE inhibitor and a known cause of a dry cough. Clopidogrel, nitroglycerin, and lovastatin do not commonly cause a dry cough. The patient’s recent MI may suggest a need for a drug like ramipril, but an alternate medication may be needed if the cough is intolerable.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat hypertension and heart failure. A common side effect of ACE inhibitors is a dry cough, which can develop even months after starting the medication. None of the other medications listed are known to cause a dry cough.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat hypertension and heart failure. Cough is a common side effect of ACE inhibitors and can persist for several weeks after discontinuation of the drug. The other options are less likely to cause a persistent dry cough.
